resources.string: Mobile and Social SDK for Android
Activity cannot be null. Register the current actvity using OMMobileSecurityService#registerActivity(Activity) preferably in onResume().
Server is not reachable at the specified address. Contact the administrator for help.
Network is unavailable. Ensure that you are connected to internet and try again.
Could not parse the response sent from the server.
The argument(s) cannot be null or empty string(s)
Updation of cookie value failed as the cookie attributes cannot be validated
The cookie to be updated does not exist
Username and password stored in Embedded Webview could not be deleted as activity was deregistered in between.
Some of the HTTP headers specified in the Map passed as a value against the key OM_PROP_CUSTOM_AUTH_HEADERS cannot be added. Refer the documentaion for the list of HTTP headers not allowed.
The number of custom auth headers which are specified as part of OM_PROP_CUSTOM_AUTH_HEADERS exceeded the maximum count (%1$d).
The requested application is not available.
For asynchronus request the call back can not be null
Http Resource URL can not be null
Logout is in progress. Try again after some time.
Logout operation failed as connection timed out.
Logout failed because of the following error: %1$s
The requested URL does not exist. Contact the administrator for help.
Username and identity domain are required.
Invalid username or password or identity domain.
Configuration properties are not found in SharedPreferences
The passed intent does not contain a URI for server configuration details.
The passed intent does not contain a valid URI for server configuration details.
Could not retrieve configuration properties from SharedPreferences
Could not store configuration properties in SharedPreferences
Initialization of the SDK failed, as the required server information is not supplied.
Application profile cannot be downloaded due to missing configuration
Application profile or application name is invalid
This device is not yet authenticated with Mobile and Social Server.
The user is not yet authenticated.
Unable to open RP Authentication URL.
Authentication blocked by server. Contact the administrator for help.
Received wipe command from server. Clearing sensitive application data.
Failed in validating calling application signature.
SSO Application name has not been provided.
SSO Agent application has been initialized successfully.
Authentication is rejected by the agent as the service domain does not match.
Client application is not authorized to participate in SSO.
Unable to open SSO Authentication URL.
OAM_ID token is not available. Check the server settings. One of the possible misconfigurations is that authentication scheme is not set as MobileOAMAuthentication.
The server encountered an error %1$s. Contact the administrator for help.
The custom authentication page does not have credentials field.
The custom strong authentication page does not have credentials field.
The custom HTML file cannot be null.
The custom HTML file path is of invalid type
The custom HTML page can not be a remote page , SDK only supports a local HTML page to be loaded
This certificate is not from a trusted authority.
There are problems with the security certificate for this URL.
Invalid state recovered from the response.
No valid access token is present for the given request. Authenticate with the appropriate scope.

The request is missing a required parameter, includes an unsupported parameter value,repeats a parameter, includes multiple credentials, utilizes more than one mechanism for authenticating the client, or is otherwise malformed.
The authenticated client is not authorized to use this authorization grant type.
The resource owner or authorization server denied the request.
The authorization server does not support obtaining an authorization code using this method.
The authorization server encountered an unexpected condition that prevented it from fulfilling the request.
The authorization server is currently unable to handle the request due to a temporary overloading or maintenance of the server.
The requested scope is invalid, unknown, malformed, or exceeds the scope granted by the resource owner.
The authorization grant type is not supported by the authorization server.
The provided authorization grant or refresh token is invalid, expired, revoked, does not match the redirection URI used in the authorization request, or was issued to another client.
